00017 typedef enum { TYPE_UNSET, TYPE_STRING, TYPE_COUNT, TYPE_ARRAY, TYPE_INTEGER, TYPE_FASTCGI, TYPE_CONFIG } data_type_t;
00018 #define DATA_UNSET \
00019         data_type_t type; \
00020         buffer *key; \
00021         int is_index_key; /* 1 if key is an array index (auto-generated keys) */ \
00022         struct data_unset *(*copy)(const struct data_unset *src); \
00023         void (* free)(struct data_unset *p); \
00024         void (* reset)(struct data_unset *p); \
00025         int (*insert_dup)(struct data_unset *dst, struct data_unset *src); \
00026         void (*print)(const struct data_unset *p, int depth)
